name: Jungos Horror Playhouse '1 night at work'
name_original: Jungos Horror Playhouse '1 night at work'
description:
- You have been told by other workers to finish your work list in order to open up the full facility of jungos. 

This is just a small sneak peek of the full game of jungo. I didn't want to spoil it so I decided to make it different. Make sure to also zoom in the game in order to see your small tasks.

P.S there is no jumpscare in this game.
